医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了免疫细胞在复杂环境中集体迁移的能力在对抗疾病时，我们的免疫细胞需要快速到达目标。奥地利科学技术研究所 (ISTA) 的研究人员现在发现，免疫细胞会主动生成自己的引导系统，以在复杂的环境中导航。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Study-sheds-light-on-immune-cells-ability-to-collectively-migrate-through-complex-environments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Study-sheds-light-on-immune-cells-ability-to-collectively-migrate-through-complex-environments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c866e9b5-88eb-47d1-97fe-7cf8d593d396 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 20:41:20 -0400 Study sheds light on immune cells' ability to collectively migrate through complex environments
美洲印第安人/阿拉斯加原住民的 COVID-19 结果仍然存在差异2020 年春天，当 COVID-19 大流行席卷新墨西哥州时，来自该州各地的重病患者被送往阿尔伯克基的新墨西哥大学医院，许多人在那里接受重症监护，依靠呼吸机呼吸。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Disparities-in-COVID-19-outcomes-persist-for-American-IndiansAlaska-Natives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Disparities-in-COVID-19-outcomes-persist-for-American-IndiansAlaska-Natives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65e775de-16b3-4a91-835d-fa1563c71737 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 20:26:53 -0400 Disparities in COVID-19 outcomes persist for American Indians/Alaska Natives
黑人仍然承受着与空气污染相关的死亡的最高负担耶鲁大学领导的一项新研究发现，减少细颗粒空气污染带来的健康益处在美国人口中的分配并不均匀。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Black-people-still-experience-highest-burden-of-air-pollution-lated-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Black-people-still-experience-highest-burden-of-air-pollution-lated-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63b840cc-de6b-4eae-98b3-31551c36b1bb Fri, 01 Sep 2023 20:20:47 -0400 Black people still experience highest burden of air pollution-related deaths
接触生物源会增加化学不耐受的风险是什么引发了化学不耐受 (CI)？在一项新发布的针对数千名美国成年人的调查中，受访者最常提到接触生物源，例如霉菌和藻类“水华”，和/或化石燃料、其燃烧产物和合成化学衍生物，例如杀虫剂、塑料和持久性有机物。污染物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Exposures-to-biological-sources-linked-to-increased-risk-of-chemical-intolerance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Exposures-to-biological-sources-linked-to-increased-risk-of-chemical-intolerance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9af079b7-daad-4924-8feb-89fd6076e176 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 20:10:17 -0400 Exposures to biological sources linked to increased risk of chemical intolerance
新研究有助于提高脑肿瘤患者免疫治疗的有效性加州大学洛杉矶分校琼森综合癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项研究揭示了为什么从身体其他部位扩散到大脑的肿瘤对免疫疗法有反应，而胶质母细胞瘤（一种起源于大脑的侵袭性癌症）却没有反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/New-research-could-help-improve-the-efficiency-of-immunotherapy-for-people-with-brain-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/New-research-could-help-improve-the-effectness-of-immunotherapy-for-people-with-brain-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c0139bb-e4f5-4277-ab70-c6a1da9ea97e Fri, 01 Sep 2023 20:00:59 -0400 New research could help improve the effectiveness of immunotherapy for people with brain tumors
艾滋病毒和成瘾治疗相结合可改善俄罗斯注射吸毒者的治疗结果波士顿医学中心的新研究发现，提供务实的支持，特别是快速获得抗逆转录病毒治疗、阿片类药物使用障碍的药物治疗以及基于优势的病例管理，可以改善俄罗斯圣彼得堡注射吸毒艾滋病毒感染者的治疗结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Integrating-HIV-and-addiction-treatment-improves-outcomes-for-people-who-inject-drugs-in-Russia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Integrating-HIV-and-addiction-treatment-improves-outcomes-for-people-who-inject-drugs-in-Russia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a707fc5-a5f9-4770-8aa2-fdd6bdcae0c9 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 19:55:55 -0400 Integrating HIV and addiction treatment improves outcomes for people who inject drugs in Russia
CHEER 获得 CDC 600 万美元拨款，用于提高波士顿的母乳喂养率波士顿医学中心的健康公平、教育和研究中心 (CHEER) 已获得疾病控制和预防中心 (CDC) 的 6,000,000 美元合作协议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/CHEER-receives-246M-CDC-grant-to-improve-breastfeeding-rates-in-Boston.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/CHEER-receives-246M-CDC-grant-to-improve-breastfeeding-rates-in-Boston.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=050ef9a5-a856-4da4-a235-69d7882eca3d Fri, 01 Sep 2023 19:47:18 -0400 CHEER receives $6M CDC grant to improve breastfeeding rates in Boston
阿姆斯特丹联电主导的项目通过人工智能和自然语言处理推动医疗保健创新80% 的患者数据是非结构化的。来自与全科医生的谈话记录、大学医疗中心专家的评估，甚至是药剂师的推荐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Amsterdam-UMC-led-project-drives-innovation-in-healthcare-with-AI-and-natural-language-processing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Amsterdam-UMC-led-project-drives-innovation-in-healthcare-with-AI-and-natural-language-processing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24f22793-7249-495d-baca-20d5047f9dfa Fri, 01 Sep 2023 15:38:04 -0400 Amsterdam UMC-led project drives innovation in healthcare with AI and natural language processing
拜登政府提出新标准以增加疗养院人员配备根据拜登政府周五提出的新规定，美国人员最稀少的疗养院将被要求雇用更多工人，这是三十年来联邦疗养院法规的最大变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Biden-administration-proposes-new-standards-to-boost-nursing-home-staffing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Biden-administration-proposes-new-standards-to-boost-nursing-home-staffing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dac077d5-78e3-4b17-89c7-bc2f4d10ba11 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 15:31:21 -0400 Biden administration proposes new standards to boost nursing home staffing
西地尼布和来那度胺的组合不能改善晚期甲状腺癌的预后由芝加哥大学医学综合癌症中心领导的一项多中心 II 期临床试验的结果表明，在靶向酪氨酸激酶抑制剂 (TKI) 西地尼布的治疗中添加免疫调节剂并未对晚期癌症患者的治疗结果产生影响由甲状腺滤泡细胞发展而来的甲状腺癌称为分化型甲状腺癌 (DTC)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Combination-of-cediranib-and-lenalidomide-does-not-improve-outcomes-in-advanced-甲状腺-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Combination-of-cediranib-and-lenalidomide-does-not-improve-outcomes-in-advanced-甲状腺-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c0cb02a-ea23-4e75-9fc0-fe9c8137710d Fri, 01 Sep 2023 15:29:29 -0400 Combination of cediranib and lenalidomide does not improve outcomes in advanced thyroid cancer
